title: Lumion 4.5.1
description:
<a href="http://lumion3d.com/lumion-4-0-release-notes/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://lumion3d.com/lumion-4-0-release-notes/</a>



CHANGES & RESOLVED ERRORS
IMPORTING
Lumion should no longer crash when importing DAE files from Revit.
Lumion should no longer flip surfaces when importing mirrored surfaces.
BUILD MODE
Grass: Scatter objects in slots 2, 5 and 7 no longer appear in a grid-like formation.
Grass: Scatter objects are now always placed in the same terrain material slot as the grass.
The number of trees/plants in scene is now displayed in the top right corner.
The Reflection Control object is now restricted to Layer 0 only.
Going from Edit Clip mode to Build mode, no longer makes trees move too quickly.
MOVIE MODE
Cloud effect: The Cloud Speed slider default value is now 0.01 to prevent the clouds from moving too fast.
Bloom effect: The minimum value of this effect is now 0.
Shots: The last keyframe in a clip should now render correctly.
Video textures no longer skip frames when rendering them in 1 and 2 Star quality.
Certain other Movie effects no longer make the moon disappear when rendering a single image.
Shadow effect: Super resolution no longer causes gaps to appear in the shadows when used in combination with the Global Illumination effect.
Global Illumination effect: The minimum value of the Falloff Speed slider is now 0 instead of 0.01 to prevent incorrect extreme lighting in a user-submitted scene.
It is no longer possible to copy incompatible effects from a clip to Ã¢â‚¬ËœEntire MovieÃ¢â‚¬Ëœ and vice versa.
Foliage effect: Grass no longer moves when playback is paused.
Trees and plants no longer move when playback is paused.
360 degree Reflection Texture: The sun is now less visible through the terrain when itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s below the horizon.
Edit clip mode: The correct camera keyframe should now be removed when deleting the first camera keyframe in a clip.
Ã¢â‚¬ËœEntire MovieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢: The duration on the timeline no longer exceeds the combined duration of the clips.
MODEL LIBRARY
Aircraft_002: This model no longer has a missing propeller.
LUMION VIEWER
The clouds are now less pixelated.
It no longer says Ã¢â‚¬ËœLumion Demo 4.5Ã¢â‚¬Ëœ in the title bar.
The Help text is no longer missing when opening an LS4 file without movie clips.
MISCELLANEOUS
Localization: Cone Angle in the Light properties is now also displayed correctly in other languages than English.
Localization: The Reflection effect slider names are now also displayed correctly in other languages than English.
Localization: All entries in the Fire properties are now also displayed correctly in other languages than English.
Localization: All entries in the Smoke properties are now also displayed correctly in other languages than English.
Localization: All entries in the Fog properties are now also displayed correctly in other languages than English.
Localization: All entries in the Falling leaves properties are now also displayed correctly in other languages than English.
Localization: Show light source as well as Speed/Memory/Accuracy now fit better in the Light properties in other languages than English.
Localization: The Brazilian language file has been copied to Portuguese.
